description:
From Middle French évaluation.
Morphologically evaluate +‎ -ion

entries.meaning: An assessment, such as an annual personnel performance review used as the basis for a salary increase or bonus, or a summary of a particular situation.
examples: The result of the semestral evaluation will go towards your final score.

entries.meaning: (mathematics) A completion of a mathematical operation; a valuation.
(computing, programming) Determination of the value of a variable or expression.
